title: ViacomCBS, Discovery Plunge on New Downgrade, Block Trades
description: (Bloomberg) -- A rally in ViacomCBS Inc. and Discovery Inc. that pushed the media companies to the top of the S&P 500 Index this year further unraveled on Friday after another major Wall Street firm said the stocks were overvalued.
